descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Welcome to the untamed frontier, where only the fastest hands survive. WildWest is a premier VR FPS that transports you into the heart of the Old West. Experience the adrenaline of high-stakes gunfights, where every bullet counts and split-second decisions determine your fate.
[media]
Intense PvP Multiplayer. Challenge real players from around the globe in thrilling real-time battles. Prove you are the fastest gun in the West in 1v1 Quick Draw Duels, or engage in psychological warfare with the high-tension Russian Roulette mode.
[media]
Strategic Team Combat: Gather your posse for 3v3 Team Battles. Coordinate with your squad to outmaneuver opponents in a tactical shooter experience that rewards teamwork and strategy.

Diverse Arsenal & Tactics: Wield more than just a six-shooter. Master the stealthy Crossbow for silent takedowns, or unleash chaos with unique Special Ammo types like Ice and Poison to turn the tide of battle.

Adaptive AI Enemies: Hone your skills against intelligent AI outlaws that flank, feint, and adapt to your playstyle, ensuring the action never gets stale.

[media]

Immersive VR Experience: Step into dusty towns and scorched deserts with charming graphics and smooth locomotion designed for Meta Quest.

Whether you are a fan of competitive multiplayer games or a solo player looking for an action-packed shooter, this game delivers endless excitement. Saddle up, load your revolver, and become a legend in this essential PvP experience.

Are you ready to be the last cowboy standing?
